did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Cornell University. Media and Technology Services.

did.physdesc: Correspondence, reports, policies, slides, photographs, and videotapes
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Correspondence, reports, policies, slides, photographs, videotapes, and other material of the office of Media and Technology Services; including the files of the first director Christopher Whittle and information on the New York State Fair, Empire Farm Days and the Educational Television Center.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, reports, policies, slides, photographs, videotapes, and other material of the office of Media and Technology Services; including the files of the first director Christopher Whittle and information on the New York State Fair, Empire Farm Days and the Educational Television Center.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Media and Technology Services Records, #21-36-3152. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

unittitle.extref: Link to a partial finding aid.

scopecontent.p: All the material in the collection may not be covered by this guide.
